attributes.action: Reopen Somerton and Langport Railway Stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Between 1906 and 1962 Somerton and Langport in Somerset were served by their own railway stations. Since then, and despite the line still running through them, you have to go to Taunton, Yeovil or Castle Cary to catch a train. Why not reopen the stations, even just as request stops?
